home.heroInfo: Launch targeted advertisement campaigns via airdrops along with economic incentives.

process1.title: Select target
process1.info: Target your desired audience for your DeFi product by simply providing a contract address. Choose from a variety of existing contracts to reach users from specific projects, and make sure your products or services are seen by the people who are most likely to explore your services.

process2.title: Create campaign
process2.info: Airvertise makes it easy to create a successful advertising campaign! Simply provide us with your campaign information, the target addresses from the previous step,  and the funds to transfer to users, and upload your promotional flyer to IPFS. We'll take care of the rest, delivering your content to the right people.

process3.title: Claim reward
process3.info: Unlock rewards with just one click! Once you receive the airdrop notification, open the promotional flyer to collect your reward!

home.feature1: Airdrops are a great way for spreading the word about your collection and providing an incentive for people to engage with it. Target other similar collections to maximize the reach of your airdrops and get the most out of your promotion.
home.feature2: Are you looking to reach the right target audience and start getting users for your product, but don't know where to start? We can help you advertise your product in a highly cost-effective manner, so you can start seeing results right away!
home.feature3: NFTs are a revolutionary way of accessing events. They provide secure and tamper-proof tickets, eliminating the possibility of counterfeiting and scalping. You can distribute tickets for your event using our contracts!
home.leftImageText: Start scaling your business by identifying and building an audience. Knowing your audience will help you create campaigns and increase your customer base.
home.rightImageText: Send invitations to events. Participating in events is a great way to spread the word about your product and get people talking about it. Itâ€™s also a great way to build relationships with potential customers.
